name: 王紳
objective:
1.靜電場(I):在真空中的靜電場
2.靜電場(II):介電材料
3.靜電場(III):解Laplace's和Poisson's Equations的一般方法
4.相對論(I):基本概念
5.相對論(II):移動電荷的電磁場
6.磁場(I):穩定電流和非磁性材料
7.磁場(II):感應電動勢和磁場
8.磁場(III):磁性材料
schedule:
1.Introduction
2.Vector Analysis
3.Vector Analysis
4.Electrostatics in Free Space
5.Electrostatics in Free Space
6.Electrostatics in Materials
7.Electrostatics in Materials
8.Electrostatics in Materials
9.Midterm Exam
10.Solution to Electrostatics
11.Solution to Electrostatics
12.Steady-State Current
13.Steady-State Current
14.Magnetostatics in Free Space
15.Magnetostatics in Free Space
16.Magnetostatics in Materials
17.Magnetostatics in Materials
18.Final Exam
materials:
1.D. K. Cheng“Field and Wave Electromagnetics” 2nd Ed.
2.N. N. Rao “Elements of Engineering Electromagnetics” 6th Ed. 2004
